sql.query: SELECT JN_DATE , GN_DATE , TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'Day') DAY_NAME , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'DD')) DAY_NUMBER , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'MM')) MONTH_NUMBER , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'YYYY')) YEAR , TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'MON') MONTH_NAME3 , TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'Month') MONTH_NAME , NEXT_DAY(GN_DATE,'SUNDAY')-7 WEEK_START_DATE , TRUNC((JN_DATE-TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(TO_DATE('01-JAN-'||TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'YYYY')),'MONDAY')-7 ,'J'))) /7)+1 WEEK_OF_YEAR , TRUNC((JN_DATE-TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(TO_DATE('01-'||TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'MON')||'-'||TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'YYYY')),'MONDAY')-7 ,'J'))) /7)+1 WEEK_OF_MONTH , (CASE TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'MM') WHEN '01' THEN 'Q1' WHEN '02' THEN 'Q1' WHEN '03' THEN 'Q1' WHEN '04' THEN 'Q2' WHEN '05' THEN 'Q2' WHEN '06' THEN 'Q2' WHEN '07' THEN 'Q3' WHEN '08' THEN 'Q3' WHEN '09' THEN 'Q3' WHEN '10' THEN 'Q4' WHEN '11' THEN 'Q4' WHEN '12' THEN 'Q4' ELSE '00' END) QUARTER_NUMBER , (GN_DATE -1) DAY_AGO_DATE , ADD_MONTHS(GN_DATE, -1) MONTH_AGO_DATE , (GN_DATE -7) WEEK_AGO_DATE , ADD_MONTHS(GN_DATE,-3) QTY_AGO_DATE , ADD_MONTHS(GN_DATE, -12) YEAR_AGO_DATE , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'YYYY'))-1980 YEAR_SEQ , (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'YYYY'))-1980)*12+TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(GN_DATE,'MM')) MONTH_SEQ , TRUNC((JN_DATE-TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(TO_DATE('01-JAN-1980'),'SUNDAY')-7 ,'J'))) /7) WEEK_SEQ FROM TABLE(get_day_rows(1980,2030))
